glsa.title: GIMP: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GIMP, the worst of which allow execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: GIMP is the GNU Image Manipulation Program.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GIMP. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted KiSS palette, GIF image or XWD file using GIMP, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GIMP users should upgrade to the latest version:
